02056 class __EXPORT TelTone : public AudioTone
02057 {
02058 public:
02059         typedef struct _tonedef {
02060                 struct _tonedef *next;
02061                 timeout_t duration, silence;
02062                 unsigned count;
02063                 unsigned short f1, f2;
02064         } tonedef_t;

02067                 struct _tonekey *next;
02068                 struct _tonedef *first;
02069                 struct _tonedef *last;

02071         } tonekey_t;
